title: BRIEF-RioCan Acquires Remaining 50% Interest In ePlace, Mixed-Use Development In Midtown Toronto
text:
BRIEF-RioCan Acquires Remaining 50% Interest In ePlace, Mixed-Use Development In Midtown Toronto

Stock Markets 18 minutes ago (Sep 27, 2019 07:41)

© Reuters. BRIEF-RioCan Acquires Remaining 50% Interest In ePlace, Mixed-Use Development In Midtown Toronto Sept 27 (Reuters) - RioCan Real Estate Investment Trust : * RIOCAN ACQUIRES REMAINING 50% INTEREST IN EPLACE™, MIXED-USE DEVELOPMENT IN MIDTOWN TORONTO * RIOCAN REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST - TOTAL PURCHASE PRICE OF $114.1 MILLION * RIOCAN REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT - SECURED $150 MILLION FINANCING TO REPLACE EXISTING CONSTRUCTION FINANCING AT INTEREST RATE OF 2.58% FOR AN 11-YEAR TERM

BRIEF-RioCan Acquires Remaining 50% Interest In ePlace, Mixed-Use Development In Midtown Toronto
